one_reviews_text:
After buying the game on Oculus and having  my Rift die, I asked for a key so I could move over to steam. They declined even though I had purchased the game.
Horrible company, I'll never buy any more of their products. 6 other companies were happy to provide me with a key for the same circumstances.
review_feedback:
The MetaQuest store is cross-buy so if you own both a Rift and Quest, you won’t have to re-purchase the game.

We do not currently support crossbuy across other platforms (such as Steam VR).

review_title: Exactly what I wanted from VR MiniGolf
one_reviews_text:
I played some MiniGolf in VR Chat and wanted more of that and this just takes that experience and makes it everything I wanted!
I can play alone or with friends and both experiences are great!
8 Courses each with a hard mode makes for essentially 16 courses to try in the base game alone. Each has its own theme and mechanic that each hole is based around.
You can find "Lost Balls" in each normal mode course each can be used as your ball in all courses from then on. Each hard mode version has a treasure hunt of sorts that leads you to bonus putter that again can be used in the future.
Just hunting for these extra bits is fun on its own!
The Start up menu/area alone is amazing!
Once I run out of things on the base courses I am definitely buying all 3 extra courses! (6 if you count the hard mode that comes with them.

This game is to mini-putt what Eleven Table Tennis is to ping pong and then some, this game goes beyond with the sheer amount of courses, customization, breathtaking decors.

The physics are extremely true to life. There are balls to find hidden throughout every course, the courses are different, no 2 holes feel the same, some have clever mechanics to potentially create endgame turnarounds a la Mario Party, of course if you manage a nearly impossible trickshot.

Like... Honestly, this game is perfect. And this is what I mean with this being the ETT of mini-putt. If you've played ETT, you know that you don't / won't ever need another ping pong game. This game is extremely affordable, has tremendous replayability AND is still actively supported? PLUS CROSSBUY...

No need to think twice, buy it and dare I say, you most likely will never need another VR mini-putt after this one. It's that amazing. Great job devs!

Edit: Just had an idea cross my mind. Down the development road, one thing that would be cool is a "Gauntlet 9 / 18 (Easy/Hard/Any)" mode where the game randomly selects holes amongst every single holes unlocked. It would most likely cause a bit of loading between holes but still, it'd create a very custom experience!
I have had alot of fun playing this with my pops. Looking foward to new maps in the future!

review_title: A real feeling VR mini golf game...
one_reviews_text: Walkabout mini golf is the best minigolf/golf game avaliable! Beautiful environments twinned with the real feel of the hit of the ball mixed with the ability to find 'lost balls' really adds to the feel of the game. One of my firm favourites. played on the oculus quest 2

The game is Fantastic!  The physics are spot on.   This game doesn't need super hi-res graphics to be an A++ game.  Low poly makes it even more fun actually.  It's an awesome game to show off what fun VR can really be.  I play with family scattered in the US, and it's a great way just to hang out and talk, play a little golf in the process, and just spend a couple of hours relaxing.   Since the game already sells for a great price , I'd be willing to pay a few more dollars if the dev added DLC, another set of holes perhaps.   The update of the scavenger hunt was cool.  I play the holes again with family, and it makes the game new again.    Great job on that update.   Young and old, this is an awesome game to have in everyone's library.   Keep up the great work......

 PS:  please work to get it in Steam since I have friends that don't do Oculus, and I'm anxious for them to download it on their headsets.   😊. Thanks.   

   

Ok, another new review.     These guys are awesome.  Just added Another Course.     I bought it with 5  I believe,  now there's 8.   This is one of the best games I have for VR.    Again I can't say enough great things about the developer...    😎


I loaded up to play tonight, and I see there are 2 new courses.   The devs are charging a small fee now.    You know, that's ok.    I bought with 5 like I stated earlier, they added 3 more at no charge, which was awesome.   A small price now is ok.   The game is that good where I'm willing to pay a little bit, if that means they'll keep improving it.    I'm a fan, keep up the good work !!!
A great game but clearly trying to rinse it charging their playerbase £2.29 for a single course when it should just be part of the natural content updates.... What a joke.
review_feedback: We have had several free in game courses added post launch in 2020.

review_title: I Just bought the Babylon stage!
one_reviews_text: First of all... LOVE this game. One of my top 5 for VR!! The new Babylon stage is very nice too! Cool atmosphere, great view and a exotic getaway! I just have one thing. The frog sound on the night stage.. too intense and too much for my taste. I know you can turn it down, but I really like the rest of the sounds so I prefer not to. Could make the frog sound optional or just make them 75% less? Thankyou for being a super great developer!!

review_title: This could be VR's killer app, love it..
one_reviews_text: I am completely serious about this.  Business meetings on the golf course, a quick catchup with your friends, even if you are not particularly fussed about mini golf there is loads of value in hanging out with friends when the focus is not just about having a conversation.
This is a must by for all VR users. weather you like golf or not, this is a brilliant game.
We all love this game, but we would all love long range shots like you have on hole 18 of the last course (non DLC), a whole course full of long range, with winds, objects would be amazing!
I'm sure this game would be great if the install ever got past 53%
review_feedback: We would recommend checking that you have enough space in your headset storage to fully download the game.

review_title: Get Ready for Hours of Fun
one_reviews_text:
This is one fantastic game.  
Each course is well though out and perfectly executed. The authors have achieved a milestone in immersive entertainment.  One each course, the player is transported to a different environment, all  with unique and interesting challenges. 
The golf ball follows the real physics of golf dynamics, no sweet spots or tricks. 

 I recommend this game to everyone, even if golf is not something you normally enjoy. I didn't, until this game!
bought randomly and i fell in love with the game! 10/10 5/5

This game is arguably better than REAL mini-golf! No waiting on people ahead of you, putter auto-sizes, TONS of ball choices (once found), but I do have a couple very minor nitpicks which kinda serve as suggestions for future improvements. 1: It's weird to me to not have both hands active at the same time, as I'm used to porting with my left hand and rotating with my right. A feature where you can enable both hands simultaneously and simply assign the putter permanently to left or right would be nice. 2: A few holes with water hazards had me hitting stroke limits constantly as they depend on SUPER-precise shots. Even the holes with verticality are easier! I would suggest adding a feature where if the ball goes into a water hazard, the game drops an arrow in the last safe spot the ball was in before entering the water and asking if you wish to do a drop for a one-stroke penalty, or reset the ball for no penalty. This would definitely ease the frustration on those precision-requiring holes!
this game is amazing! from the vr graphics to the sounds! its a great way to get away from reality, and enjoy various scenery and epic challenges! pls cont to make more courses I'd def purchase them!
Come on, show me any other app with a rating this high. I'll wait.
Go and get this game, you won't regret it! The devs are awesome!
Physics are perfect, controllers are perfect, movement is perfect, menu is perfect, what eles to say its the real mini golf VR Deal, Great job DEVS #1 in my book of after almost 6 years in VR.
Great on Quest2, but it is so beautiful via AirLink. The Music is wonderful. Instant buy of the new Course. ;)
mega fun and i love the art direction

The game itself is great, but on PC the new map DLC is broken. In game when you click the get course button nothing happens, and when you buy it through the oculus app still nothing happens, other than your card being charged
review_feedback:
Hey, sorry about that. We've been having connectivity issues to the Oculus servers on PC. I believe we have a fix in beta (we just keep pinging the server until it finally responds) that should roll out soon. If you want to try the beta now, just go to this page, and next to Version, choose the Rift DLC Beta channel. Then on Oculus desktop you should be able to update the app. https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/2328506790595457/

EDIT: Hey just circling back as this should have been fixed a while ago. Thanks!

review_title: Go no further if you wan't golf in VR
one_reviews_text:
This was an instabuy as soon as I saw it! I really like the art style and the physics are superb. Easy courses can be beat fast but the hard ones are more fun. The ball collecting side game is a nice touch! Multiplayer is a lot of fun too! The devs are welcoming ideas on their Discord server so the next updates will be adding improvements to the game.

The new update with the new course is really good! I'm waiting for the hard version of it got really good at minigolf :D

Several updates into the game and the new content is better and better! I would give more stars if I could. Still the best!

VR Golf as it should be! Probably the best VR Golfing game I have played to date! Very simple controls, yet very fun gameplay. Don't even really need a tutorial in this game as their nothing special about hitting the ball, you just start playing and your fine. Wish more VR golf games did this, they would be considerably better if they did. Graphics are fairly good and uncomplicated, the various courses are challenging enough, much like what you would expect to find at a real mini-golf course. Could play this for hours without even realizing it.
good

Edit: Even better after the reccent Don Quixote Course update!!

This is one of the best VR mini golf experiences out there, my only complaint is that I wish that there were more holes to play, but this is more than made up by the extras like the hidden balls, foxhunts, and multiplayer. 20/10 very good game.
As above

The game has been absolutely too fun to play.
The only thing I would like to see, maybe I just haven't seen it, is the ability to have multiple players on the same machine (local multiplayer I guess). My kids really wanna play too!

review_title: Finally got the mini-golf we wanted!
one_reviews_text:
Since I bought the Rift a few years back I have been looking for a mini golf (or disc golf) experience that had 3 basic things right:
-good consistent physics
-easy social multiplayer experience
-fun interesting courses 
This is the FIRST game to finally deliver on these, and I have tried many on steam and Oculus store.   Why did it take so long for something seemingly so basic and decent to come to us?  Who knows, but its here now and Ive been getting all my friends with VR to buy this game ASAP so we can play together.  I'm hooked and its well worth the low price entry!  HIGHLY RECCOMEND.

This was one of the first apps I bought this past month when I bought a Quest 2. This game has so many good things going for it: 

1. It's very immersive even with the cartoonish graphics
2. The sounds and environments are great
3. No stinky hot air/no annoying families/no bug bites
4. "God Mode" or looking over the course is very cool
5. Teleportation or smooth motion with speed adjustments
6. "Lost balls" on every course which gives players more to do with a solid excuse to check out the environments
7. You only need to use one controller
8. Great amount of content considering the price
9. Simple and beautiful enough for anyone

My expectations were 100% met by playing singleplayer. However, my little bro just picked up a Quest 2 and I bought him this so we could play together. Co-op in this game is everything I wanted and more. It's amazing. Him and I haven't had so much fun with so much laughing in years. My little bro trying to putt one in but I can see his head bobbing up and down from laughing so hard while I'm laying down trying to block his shot with my head yelling "You Jack@*s!", or getting down by my near-missed shot saying "Why won't you go home ball, are you too good for your home?!". Happy Gilmore lines work in this, believe me.  

I honestly cannot think of any negatives.

Walkabout Mini Golf is my go to game and I play it just about everyday. I don't have too much more to add except to keep it up! Magnificent VR game!

I would like to request a minor change if I may. How hard would it be to add a "start over" button to the scorecard in the course preview screen? When I am really trying to master one of the new courses I like to play it over and over. A player always has to exit to the main menu and choose the game again to start over. If that button could be added that would be great!  

Thanks in advance and appreciate the wonderful VR experience!

ok imma be quick on the features because other reviews are better for that.
Minigolf that feels LEGIT!
finding ball skins hiding through out each match is fun
The landscapes feel real nice.

Ok now that that's out of the way. GET THIS GAME. It is the definitive mini golf VR game. Trust me i've tried them all.
As simple as the title ! Easily the game I spent the most time on my vr !! Big PROPS !!!

Easy to play, good mutiplayer game with voice chat .
Cross platform, Must have at a low price.

Very good game lmao
uh
yes very good
fun and it's realistic 
reccomend 
:D
this is what VR is about. Just so much fun to get on this game and play. EVRYTHING WORKS and feels real.

review_title: Easily gave me my minigolf fix
one_reviews_text:
Update: had to switch it to 5 stars. New locomotion, courses and single account multiplayer make this one of the best value for money I think I've made on the oculus store.

Had plans to play some real minigolf today and it started raining. Decided to pick this up to get my fix and it did not disappoint. Physics feel great and courses feel realistic rather than over the top with gimmicks. 

Would like to have a total simulation mode where the clubs and balls are physical objects that you need to pick up and place and you'd have a physical score card you could write your strokes. Would make some carnage while playing with friends.

Definitely needs an option for smooth locomotion as well. Not a fan of forced teleport.

Would definitely pick up some more courses as DLC. A halloween themed course would have been great or a Winter themed Christmas course.

review_title: hanging out with my friends, and golf
one_reviews_text: The courses are beautiful in a cartoon-like way; the physics throughout is strikingly realistic. I love this game so much more than real life! The multiplayer mode is exceptionally nice, letting you play against anyone else, anywhere, without even needing to log in to Facebook at all (at least in the Rift S version). This is how we party in these covid times.

This game is a blast to either play solo and try to beat your best score, or to get together with friends. The environments are beautiful even with simple graphics. The pace of the gameplay can be as fast as you want, or take your time to chat in multi-player. Physics are satisfyingly realistic.

The latest update with ability to fly the course is genius and allows you to get the unique vantage point you want, or to visit the mountain peak towering above you. I like the new music on most of the courses. If I want to just enjoy the environmental sounds it's easy to turn the music down to zero in setting. Definitely recommend picking up the game.

Devs please keep the new courses coming! :)

These guys nailed it.
1.) Easy as pie multiplayer setup. If you're like my family, you can use 1 Oculus account across multiple devices.
2.) Gameplay is near identical to real life as far as I can tell. The physics of everything felt very accurate.  I never once thought the game control 'cheated' me.
3.) The maps are nice to walk around with lots of play variety.
4.) There's a little 'find the balls' side game built into every map, which kept the kids entertained between turns.

Overall it was a lot of fun and a great way to spend time with family.

UPDATE 3/19: They Added free DLC!  The coolest space station mini golf course imaginable.
Great fun!  Should be on everyones virtual shelf.  How about maybe a trophy or club for our virtual homes?

One of the best VR games I've ever played.
Beautiful graphics, realistic physics and fun courses, this game has it all!

Practically exactly what I was hoping for, a brilliant little well thought out mini golf experience with so far, (only had one full game as of writing), very good course design and interesting side content, being the balls hidden throughout the course and the treasure hunt on the first map's hard mode.

Well done to the devs, this is brilliant! The graphics, physics and social aspects all come together so well to make a statement about how great VR can be with friends. Two of my favourite extra features are the zoomed out view of the entire course that you get from the menu and the custom balls you find around the place like an easter egg hunt! Great stuff

so I've played this game for about 4 months, and every time I was stressed, or bored I'd get on the quest 2 and play. after a 20 min of play Im calm,  had my fun
so then it was time to stop overall this game is worth your money

review_title: It's putt-putt in VR, what else to say?
one_reviews_text: This is a solid mini golf sim that is really fun with friends, and feels good to play. The graphics, while simple, are very nice to look at, and it runs very smooth. There is a lot of content to explore and for $15 for both a PC and Quest version it's a lot of value for money. If you are at all interested in this concept, you should definitely check it out.

review_title: A Game for Lifetimes of fun
one_reviews_text: It is simply just an amazing game. You got well though out courses with support for 5 friends and the maps are beautiful. The background music is super chill and relaxed. After all that you can still find hidden custom balls and solve the foxhunts for custom putters. This game I will be playing for years. Highly recommend for singleplayer, with friend, with family, all of the above just buy it already!
Great for multi player and its cross play and cross buy if you have a quest 2 and rift s
I bought it expecting to refund it later but I was shocked. The game is absolutely amazing and it feels great. Would recommend. 10/10

TL;DR summary:  Amazing game, you are wrong if you're on the fence about buying this!  My brother and I logged in an insane amount of hours since we bought it.  It's almost become a nighttime ritual (which has been making waking up for work the next day very hard!!) 

Now for the lengthy review:
In many ways, mini golf speaks for itself.  This game takes everything that makes mini golf great and keeps on going!  The courses are incredibly fun and are a blend of normal-realistic as well as some courses only possible in a world where there's no threat of suing because someone slipped and fell to their death, haha!  ...oh yeah, and courses where you are also walking around with a bucket of balls always at the ready (for when you keep missing and knock them over the side of a mountain).  The physics are solid and they thought through a lot of smaller things also, like the ability to half to hold down the trigger to hit the ball (accidental ball hits are a real thing!).   

Big kudos for the fifth course (gothic castle)!!  What a beautiful course!  And points for being able to tie it into two holidays.  (The Castle on Hard is the Christmas course)

Suggestions for updates (as of 12/24)

There's a few suggestions I'll add or things I wish were different, but I'm going to preface this by saying that nothing I'm about to say comes close to taking off a star for this game.  It is throughly enjoyable and a clear winner.

When teleporting, I wish my character would land right on the circle I say to teleport to, instead of to the side.  I also wish the auto-teleport could adjust for the courses where that throws you into a mountain or floating over a cliff.

Lastly, I wish there was a way to prevent having to hit through a wall/embankment, and that there was a way to move the ball out the length of the club when you land right against something that prevents you from swinging.

Oh, and we need a course with a windmill and something that opens/closes. that's classic mini golf!

Best VR game I have played honestly. I have a brother in Florida and my best friend lives in California, while I’m in Texas. This game is a great way for us to laugh and “hang out” even though we are far away. Highly recommend this game.

I played mini golf only few times in real life. But this game got me hooked even if there is a lot of room for improvement (on my side).
Some maps are incredibly beautiful and I would have never thought to dive into mini golf for hours and hours.

If your looking for a very fun and relaxing game to play with friends. go on the hunt for some golf balls and golf cubs, some maps are VERY challenging but very fun, Its is a pretty realistic meaning you really have to hit the ball sometimes an sometimes barly tap the ball.   Really hoping for ssoem new maps and extras to be added soon!!

review_title: Like others said.. the physics are great
one_reviews_text: This game has become the showcase item for multiplayer. I had my old quest since I bought the OQ2 and wanted something to play them both.. this was EASY to setup.  None of the crazy difficulties of other games.  The physics are perfect and it is EASY for new VR users to play.  I have had countless other games confuse people who dont use VR regularly. Super happy with this title! keep it up guys..

It's probably more accurate to say that there are 10 courses than 5.  The nighttime versions of the courses have similar holes as the daytime, but all of them are changed to be more difficult.  This game was released with 3 courses.   Now there are five, and very soon, there will be a sixth.  The devs are active and busy, and I suspect there'll be yet another one down the line at least, along with various other definite features I've been told about by the devs themselves.  I've been playing VR for years, and this is the best value I've gotten out of any game.
The more you play these courses, the better you learn how to handle playing each hole.  The replayability here is significant.

Also, this game is noob-proof and idiot-proof.  Anyone can play this right away and get the full experience.

The game needs an Honour system.  So many players quit just because you get ahead by one stroke, and it's really frustrating to not get to finish.  How about Gold for players who honour a higher number of full games played (whether they win or lose,) silver for the runners who bail when it goes balls up, etc, and so on..   And in order to play in that Honour level, you have to keep your Honour to each match  Just a thought.  Rest of the game makes it worth the money I spent on the headset!!  My Go-to game!   Ever.
This is absolutely one of the best vr games available. It's fun, full of content, and great for multiplayer. Just buy it.

Hi Developers your latest update has done this error to my game, it won't load?? This happened a few weeks back too. I ended up uninstalling the game then reinstalling it which lost me all my progress. I don't want to have to uninstall and lose my progress this time thanks! Love the game by the way and playing with friends is awesome!..
review_feedback: Hey, sorry we don't actually have any control over the install process at that all happens through the Oculus software. We're working on cloud save but it's a ways out still. Oh and for not loading, what happens exactly?

review_title: Awesome game for so many reasons
one_reviews_text:
Great physics, great graphics, fun courses and so much fun to play with friends.
One suggestion  - randomize hole position? Is that possible?
Doesnt matter if not this is still the game I play EVERY day!  :)

review_title: The Game everyone wants to play!
one_reviews_text: Straight up this is the easiest vr experience to get everyone hooked on VR so freakin fun....

Controls are intuitive and easily understandable for even a child. Very easy to join a game with friends, too. 

Courses have a realistic feel to them. You could see a lot of these golf courses in real life, too.

The balls are somewhat easy to find, though...

Feels very well optimized. Club feels great in the hand. Everything felt very intuitive and nothing felt clustered. Wish there was a way to know if the hidden ball was already found in an area, perhaps a very subtle indicator, otherwise really great game!

This has to be the best mini golf game there is! When you play, you'll forget at times it's not real. The courses are a great design, not too eeasy, not over the top so that it's all luck, and a great variety. IRL if I was going to go play mini golf, these are the types of courses I'd want to go play. the mechanics are great, easy to pick up on, physicals feel real. You can play by yourself for hours if you don't make yourself stop, and playing with other people makes it even better.

This is a great game, no motion sickness. It uses teleporting or pressing trigger to line up to ball. Feels good to play graphics are simple but look nice and having lost balls to look for on the courses is a nice touch. 

VR must have in my opinion

Great game! Really realistic, great family fun! Recommend to everyone..... 

Sould try to do a great online, for example matchmaking with someone same skill levels etc or maybe find some rare balls or like create a function yo make/design your own balls..... masssive scope for this game!!!! Hope it happens would make it best game in VR

Danny

Plenty to do, they have like 10 courses now and they are all pretty fun, really relaxed gameplay, and tons of small side quests and island exploration to do to get new golf balls and clubs. physics are good, not perfect, but good to play if you want to relax and unwind. 5 stars

review_title: Yup this is the one you are looking for.
one_reviews_text:
Having tried the other VR mini golf iterations I've been left annoyed by the lack of realism when it comes to level design and club feel. When I play mini golf in the real world, I expect practical holes that can be accomplished in 1-3 strokes, with most all being "hole-in-one-able" while having a vibrant/fun setting. 

This game hits the nail on the head.

The level design is superb. The holes are the perfect balance of realism and fantasy all while placing you in a vibrant walkable, connected course. None of the holes feel too 'arcadey', and there are 0 gimmicks. The putting feels SO good and the physics really shine. 

This is the mini golf game you have always wanted for VR and I'm excited to see what future courses and updates are added to the game!

Hopes and suggestions for future updates: 
-smooth locomotion and turning
-more interactivity with scenery, world objects to play with
-trigger events for doing certain paths/putts
-more courses!
-in-game tournament mode/comp play/ranked
-more unlockable golf balls for completing daily objectives or tasks
-ability to throw golf club (lol)
-custom club designs
-custom character heads/models
-daily leaderboards
-record of all hole-in-ones and/or items/balls for getting hole-in-ones

review_title: Great minigolf game with a couple issues
one_reviews_text:
Overall it's great. I've had a ton of fun with friends with this game. The graphics are fun, the locales are enjoyable, and the courses range from trivial to a bit frustrating until you learn the tricks, then they're fun.

The main issue we have is how easy it is to get kicked from the game, at least on Quest 2. It seems like someone can't take their headset off for even a single minute without getting disconnected. We've all tweaked our Quest-level sleep settings to multiple minutes and still we'll lose connection to the game in less than a minute to run to the bathroom or something. This is really the only major issue - we've had to restart so many times because someone went to get a drink and it drops them in a minute.
review_feedback: Hey sorry for the slow reply, all of these should be fixed now, it will still disconnect when the headset sleeps but prompt you to rejoin when it wakes back up.

one_reviews_text: My friend suggested I purchase this game and I was so impressed with how fun it is, Especially to play while just chatting with your friends. I really suggest you give it a go. Has a good discord community as well.

Those were the words my friend uttered when we were standing under a beautiful cell shaded Sakura tree. In truth, we bought the game on a whim. We figured it would be a good way to pass the time between playing more "advanced" games... We proceded to spend the next 3 hours playing mini-golf together even though we are a thousand miles apart. 10/10

Play days of socially-distanced mini golf for a fraction of the price of actually taking the kids out to play mini golf. Perfect physics and cleverly designed courses make for great gameplay. Santa may be bringing a 2nd Quest this year so greatly looking forward to family head-to-head matches on this one. Highly recommended!
This game is an absolute blast to play!!!  The physics are great, the support is great, and playing with your friends is the absolute best.  Great work guys and gals!
Super fun game, even more fun to play with other people you know. Finding balls at every hole is a good extra and the fox hunts for the clubs on each night level is a cool addition as well.
really enjoy this game , I play on my rift s and my friends use my quest 2 and we play the private match option. Super fun . Great job by the developer , Great feel and mechanics . Works great !!!

review_title: Excellent Title - Wound buy a DLC!
one_reviews_text:
The courses, environment, physics, and overall experience is stunning!  The pirate theme is my absolute favorite, and the skill/difficulty level is perfect for all ages.  

The scenery was so gorgeous and exciting, I started snapping pictures with my headset and texting them to family.  I've never done that in any Rift/Quest title before!  The Western and Japanese are still enjoyable, but a little more challenging.  

Please consider even more courses and themes in the lighter skill level for kids and older adults.  Possible theme expansions: Jungle, Castle, Egyptian, Ocean, Beach, Winter Holiday, Viking, and Polynesian.

Ive rather surprisingly spent the last 11 days doing pretty much nothing but playing this game. It's pretty fun in single player, but multiplayer is just about the most fun I've had the entirety of 2020 (low bar, but I stand by it). 

It really feels like mini golf, and playing across a beautiful island, or tea garden with your friends is a really fun and relaxing way to spend time.

As it is its a very very good minigolf game for VR. The putting feels incredibly natural, and the only flaw ive noticed is that if the ball comes to a slow roll, it stops before it probably would in real life, as if the game freezes it at a certain minimum speed rather then when it stops, if that makes any sense. This isnt much of an issue unless it stops right at the edge of the cup, which happend more often than it should have. 

I hope this game gets more courses through updates. The courses included are well worth the current price, but theyn will eventually get old, and my friends and I enjoy the multiplayer, so I wouldnt want to reach a point where we dont play it again. 

With the simulation and mechanics being so smooth, it would be great to have a custom course editor, but obviously thats a big ask. Howevere it would be amazing within this framework and guarentee infinite replayability.
review_feedback: Thanks! We're working on new courses, and just released an update that smooths the physics out even more!

one_reviews_text: This is a great little game. Really well thought out and keeps me and the family entertained. The Physics are great and the graphics just right. Our Headsets are 2 x Rift S, 1 Quest and 1 Quest 2 and all of us can play together in a private room with no issues with Crossplay. My only comment for improvement would be to add a course designer so that other users can add their own content, because the 6 courses are fine, but your left itching for more courses. If they went in that direction, it would just be a game that kept on giving.
Great physics, Great courses and Great fun! The only thing I want is smooth locomotion and smooth turning, which would be amazing!

Wow didnt expect much from this but 2 hours later I was still playing, you know a game of skill like this is good when you know a mistake is down to your misjudgement, thats what makes this so fun. Graphics are cartoony cel shading but its all solid and very chilled, goes well with the game. Physics seem to be spot on. More courses please!

I have a lot of games I enjoy in VR. Pavlov, Elite Dangerous (was hooked on that as I played Elite in the 1980s on a Commodore 64), Star Wars Squadrons etc etc. I recently bought this and my brother and his son and wife played a couple rounds. This is hands down the best VR game I've ever played. The  mini golf maps are crazy good. The physics is spot on! The audio in game just works (and 3 people were on the Quest 2 Wireless and I was on the Rift S).  This game is crazy good! I was also super impressed when, after 9 holes, my brother logged off as he thought we were quitting. We kept playing and got a few holes ahead. He joined back up and the game was smart enough to just let him catch up! Very well written! My only complaint, and it is not really a complaint, is that I wish you could just buy more courses. It is so good that I literally would love to give the developers more money! I'd gladly pay $5 per course for new courses! (just to be clear.. you can unlock extra courses within game for free!)  I wish I could give it more than 5 stars!

Quite simply, this is the best mini golf game in VR. The physics are accurate, the courses are well designed, and the interface is very intuitive. It only requires the use of one controller - you can simply check your over/under and hole information by glancing at your wrist. I'm hoping more courses and quality of life features continue to be added (since the dev has already added one course since release) but as of now, this is worth the asking price and then some. Great fun alone or with friends. An easy buy.

review_title: BEST VR multiplayer game ever played
one_reviews_text:
Yes. Is the BEST VR multiplayer game ever played and the best golf/mini-golf game (VR or not VR) I ever played. I have no doubts.
Simply nice graphics.
Simply good physics.
Simply... FUN.
I want more courses !!! :-D

Great game for a while, but after the novelty runs out it’s just a very basic mini golf game. Graphics are very average but it’s 15 bucks. 
I’ve given it 4 stars to be generous to the devs. For me really it’s more like a 3.5.
Again, fun game. Just not for long

I had been looking for a good minigolf game to play with friends, chill and have a good time and I'm happy to say that this is it! Very relaxing courses, graphics fit the atmosphere, neat physics and easy teleport locomotion. It can even be played sitting! Definitely worth the money, can't wait for more courses!

Play with five friends during covids. It's like being there with them. If you love minigolf and scavenging the maps looking for new balls, well this game is an easy buy. TO the devs! great work, maps keep coming (and are great!), custom maps will take this game to the top.
If you develop dlcs I will buy them

I don't really know what else to say about this game. It's wonderful. It's simple, it's fun, it's relaxing, and the little treasure hunts for lost golf balls and putters gives that extra punch instead of being a straight up mini golf game. Physics are basically spot on. Kudos to the developer because this game is amazing.

review_title: Easily the best VR mini golf game!
one_reviews_text: Decided to take a punt (har har) on this one, glad I did. Low poly stylized graphics suit this type of game perfectly, they have really nailed the feeling of being in a real themed mini golf park. Multiplayer is lots of fun, but even the single player mode is worth a go if you have nobody to play with. Good job developer, I hope you continue to refine what you have but also add more courses, more interactivity with the environments etc.

First of all, this game supports cross-buy, I bought it for quest then it was free for rift-s.  Also, it is the only game supports multi-play in single account.  If you have both rift and quest, you can play together using same account (up to 5 players can use same oculus account).  Game system and physics so great, control also really easy to use.  After playing several hours with my family and friends, only I wish more is customized avatar.  This game is awesome!

review_title: The new king of vr minigolf
one_reviews_text: This game is fantastic. I love playing cloudlands with friends, but that game has always been super dodgy physics-wise and janky to control, this one is basically perfection. All it needs now is custom maps like cloudlands

It doesn't feel exactly like you're playing minigolf, but it's close enough to be a good and chill experience for a casual minigolfer! :) The club obviously lack weight, but the ball physics are on point, and the environment is really pretty! No regrets! :)

I love this. Simple but fun to play. Cartoon graphics are good.
This would be fantastic if it could have a high graphics mode for details.

But what a fun game to play. Worth the money
This game is spot on with the putting. Golf and VR are a natural. If you are looking for a well done game to relax or play against friends, this is your ticket.
got this after reading reviews so got it on a whim and wow great game the only problem is i have with it is the wife played it now i cant get on it what a awsome game. fun to play from what i see

Sick Dope Sick AF

Put out map DLC ill buy them all
This game is so much fun. Well worth the money. I would highly recommend this game.
Looks good, multiplayer is flawless and the general feel is pretty realistic

review_title: Great environments and fun with friends!
one_reviews_text: Very fun to play with friends, the game has great physics. The set design is some of the best I've seen in VR, it's like they hired some Naughtydog level designer to make them golf courses. They're incredible. Great to show people new to VR in terms of visuals and physics.
I am very satisfied with how great this game is so far. I really enjoy the different courses/environments, and the gameplay has been a lot of fun. Would definitely recommend.

Definitely worth the price!  Takes me back to those fun mini-golf courses you went to at the beach.  I enjoy this more than Top Golf: Pro Putt as it feels like an actual mini-golf experience and I can play with more than 2 people.  If you love mini-golf this is a must buy!
